name: Chenopodium anthelminticum

Urine: Copious, yellow, foaming urine, with acrid sensation in urethra
Back: INTENSE PAIN BETWEEN ANGLE OF RIGHT SHOULDER-BLADE NEAR SPINE, and through the chest
Ears: Comparative deafness to sound of voice, but GREAT SENSITIVENESS TO SOUND, AS OF PASSING VEHICLES and also a shrinking from low tones

details: Characteristic pain in scapula very marked. Symptoms of apoplexy, right hemiplegia, and aphasia. Stertorous breathing. (Opium.) Sudden VERTIGO. Meniere's disease. Affections of auditory nerves. (Nat-salicyl.) Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm and roundworm.EARS; SEROUS OR BLOODY EFFUSIONS IN THE LABYRINTH; chronic otitis media; progressive DEAFNESS TO THE VOICE, BUT SENSITIVE TO SOUNDS of passing vehicles and other sounds; buzzing; absent or deficient bone conduction; a consciousness of the ear; hearing better for shrill, high-pitched sounds than for low ones Spasm of smooth muscle everywhere, intestinal colic, uterine colic, bronchial spasm, tachycardia, etc.
dosage: Third potency. Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm, 10 minim doses every 2 hours for 3 doses; also Carbon Tetrachloride.
